osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities in the osu-wiki repository include updates to the `MWC 7K 2025` team listing and rules, as well as the addition of a news post for the `3 Digit World Cup 2025: Registrations Now Open!` event, complete with a registration link, banner image, and forum thread link.

osu.summary: The osu repository has seen a recent pull request aimed at fixing issues with angle bonuses, specifically addressing the calculation of repetition and the application of distance scaling to wide bonuses, marking the third round of angle bonuses fixes.
